title: iDigital
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘He has become hostile’: My mom is in her 80s and has dementia. My brother is blocking access.
items.description: “Can someone who has not been found legally incompetent, but who has a history of delusions, make decisions regarding property?”

items.title: ‘Sparkle, color, and glitter’: See how Jonathan Scott and Zooey Deschanel decorated their $9.5 million L.A. home for the holidays
items.description: “Property Brothers” star Jonathan Scott and actress Zooey Deschanel, who got engaged in 2023, have decked the halls of their sprawling Los Angeles hom...

items.title: Kylie Jenner lists ‘modern fortress’ in swanky SoCal neighborhood for $48 million
items.description: Kylie Jenner is offloading her Los Angeles concrete megamansion for $48 million after finishing building her sprawling Hidden Hills property.

items.title: SocGen’s model says ‘yes, silver’s in a bubble’ but its analysts say ‘no’ it isn’t.
items.description: There are structural tailwinds favoring silver, plus potential export restrictions by the U.S. and China that could tighten the stretched physical mar...

items.title: I’m afraid my financial adviser will steal my money. I’ve read too many cautionary tales. How can I be sure?
items.description: “I am 66 years old and have been retired for about a year and a half.”
